tool_description: Generates optimal navigation paths between warehouse locations for picking routes, restocking operations, and general movement optimization.

start_location.description: Starting point bin ID or zone identifier

destination_locations.description: List of destination bin IDs to visit

vehicle_type.description: Type of vehicle or equipment: walking, forklift, pallet_jack, cart

error_messages: Invalid start_location: Starting location must exist in the warehouse layout.
Invalid destinations: One or more destination locations do not exist.
Inaccessible location: Some locations are not accessible by the specified vehicle_type.
Invalid vehicle_type: Must be one of [walking, forklift, pallet_jack, cart].
Invalid optimize_for: Must be one of [shortest_distance, shortest_time, least_congestion].
usage: Provide start_location and array of destination_locations. Optionally specify vehicle_type and optimize_for criteria to generate the most efficient path.

path_sequence.description: Ordered sequence of locations to visit for optimal route

total_distance_meters.description: Total distance of the generated path in meters

estimated_time_minutes.description: Estimated time to complete the path in minutes
